attributes.action: Call a general election as we have lost confidence in this government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in the UK have never struggled so much financially since Gordon Brown has been made Prime Minister. He needs to realise that there are a lot of unhappy people who have no confidence in his leadership skills and decisions.  Wages are not keeping up with the all the tax hikes and price increases. Its time we had a government in place that understood the real needs of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
